question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. forward sign
B. bus sign
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The objects are at similar distances from the camera and are both in the mid-to-far background, making it difficult to determine which is closer without a depth map.
